name: Solid Perfume single
description: Now shipping WORLDWIDE! Finally, a way to keep smelling Con*Tact fresh all day long. Continue rocking the great scent of your favorite Con*Tact soap with our new solid perfume. Packed in a discreet, portable plastic chapstick sized tube, it's ready to apply to pressure points like your wrists, neck, and shoulders. Solid perfume makes a wonderful gift for men and women alike! Perfect size for pockets or your purse, our solid perfumes are a great way to keep smelling awesome long after your shower. For added complexity, try combining different scent markings and soaps together for a truly unusual and individual scent that's all yours! Solid perfumes are vegan! Ingredients : Candelilla Wax (Euphorbia antisyphilitica), Avacado Oil (Persea americana), Coconut Oil (Cocos Nucifera oil), Shea Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii), Scent oil, bodysafe mica (for color). Note: solid perfumes are not caffeinated. Read a little bit more about our solid perfumes, including what people are saying about them here on our forum.

name: Buy 5 Soaps, Get 1 Free: Mixed 6 Pack (READ DESCRIPTION)
description: In order to get the Buy 5, Get 1 Free discount, you must use THIS LISTING to do so, rather than buying the bars individually. So many tempting scents, but having a hard time deciding where to start? With a big variety, if you'd like! This listing is for 6 bars of your choice. Mix and match our standard pawprint bars however you'd like. Want 2 of one scent, and then 4 other different ones? We can do that! And at the $30 price, it's essentially "buy 5, get 1 free" Definitely the best deal for stocking up! Once you've placed your order, you will be linked to a form (or click here) where you can specify your 6 bar choices. You are welcome to mix caffeinated/non caffeinated soaps as you choose. If we don't receive your choices within 24 hours of payment, we will send you a random (good!) selection of 6 soaps. Not sure exactly which scents you want? How about you just tell us what category of scent you like, and we'll pick 6 bars from that grouping. Click the categories on the right hand side to see how the scents are organized. We also now offer a "Surprise Me!" option, for our more adventurous customers. We'll pick 6 of our awesome caffeine soaps for you in a nice wide variety.

name: Mix and Match: Cube Pack (3 soaps + 1 solid perfume)
description: A smaller mixed pack of our soaps, the Cube Pack is named so because it comes in a perfectly cube-shaped box. Mix n' Match: Design your perfect Cube Pack by choosing 3 soaps and 1 solid perfume! You will receive a prompt after checkout to give us your selections. Cube Packs are available in decaf as well, just let us know you'd like decaf for your selections.

name: Soap: Sakura Shishi - Japanese Cherry Blossom
description: Most people know Sakura is a cherry blossom. What the heck is a Shishi? They're these awesome temple lions, and we had to make a soap dedicated to them. Our Sakura Shishi soap is a well rounded mimic of what real cherry blossoms smell like, with the slightest hint of fruity undertones. Super clean, super fresh, super nice! Cast in a light pink bar, and dusted with bodysafe silver mica. The label is a collectible vinyl sticker, featuring artwork by NeoGeen. Also available as a solid perfume. See what other people have to say about this soap here on our forums. Con*Tact's soap is a very mild vegetable glycerin combined with shea for moisturizing. The lather is incredibly thick and is great when used with a bath scrubby pouf for extra suds. "Frosting" may occur as the caffeine crystallizes on the surface of the soap, and will rinse off with the next use. Our soaps are all available without caffeine as well! Simply use the dropdown menu below to select the option you'd like.Con*Tact Caffeine Soap is for adults only, and is not safe for children. Please choose our "decaf" option if you're giving our soap to anyone under 18. Caffeine Soap Ingredients: Coconut oil, Palm oil, Safflower oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Shea butter (refined naturally crushed), Purified water, Sodium hydroxide, Caffeine, Sorbitol, Sorbitan oleate, Soy bean protein, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance oils, Body safe colorants. Decaf Soap Ingredients: Coconut oil, Palm oil, Safflower oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Shea butter (refined naturally crushed), Purified water, Sodium hydroxide, Sorbitol, Sorbitan oleate, Soy bean protein, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance oils, Body safe colorants. Con*Tact soap is vegan. Each bar is approximately 3.3oz, or 2.75" X 1.25". This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

It has the aroma of the fresh outdoors, which begins with top notes of summer dandelion, refreshing verbena, and soft heliotrope; followed by middle notes of spring meadows, lily of the valley, and weeping willow; all sitting on base notes of sweet pea blossoms and Kentucky blue grass. This is a lovely light yellow soap with a soft pink shimmer on top. This used to be MLP: Fluttershy. The label is a collectible vinyl sticker, featuring artwork by Onnanoko. Also available as a Scent Marking (solid perfume). See what other people have to say about this soap here on our forums. Con*Tact's soap is a very mild vegetable glycerin combined with shea for moisturizing. The lather is incredibly thick and is great when used with a bath scrubby pouf for extra suds. "Frosting" may occur as the caffeine crystallizes on the surface of the soap, and will rinse off with the next use. Our soaps are all available without caffeine as well! Simply use the dropdown menu below to select the option you'd like.Con*Tact Caffeine Soap is for adults only, and is not safe for children. Please choose our "decaf" option if you're giving our soap to anyone under 18.
